browserSupportWarningPortal.heading: Unsupported platform
browserSupportWarningPortal.intro: It seems like you are using a browser or operating system that does not support the features used in this application.
browserSupportWarningPortal.moreDetails: For more details, please see <docLink>this compatibility table</docLink>.
browserSupportWarningPortal.outro: You can proceed and try anyway, but please note that some or all application features might not work.

tourGuide.tourStep1: Here, you can view all your stored credentials. Click the 'Add New Credentials' card to get a new VC from an available Issuer
tourGuide.tourStep2: Click this button to scan a QR code for sending or receiving credentials.
tourGuide.tourStep3: The 'Credentials' page is your Home page, where you can manage your credentials.
tourGuide.tourStep4: The 'Add Credentials' page allows you to receive credentials from a specific Issuer
tourGuide.tourStep5: Use the 'Send Credentials' page to select a verifier for sharing your credentials.
tourGuide.tourStep6: On the 'History' page, you can view details of credential transmissions, including when and to which verifiers they were sent.
tourGuide.tourStep7: In the 'Settings' page you can manage your passkeys and account settings.
tourGuide.tourComplete: Thank you for completing the tour, we hope it was helpful!

welcomeModal.title: Welcome to wwWallet!
welcomeModal.descriptionPart2: , your ultimate tool for managing digital credentials. Effortlessly view, get, present and keep track of all your credentials!
welcomeModal.question: Are you ready to explore the features of wwWallet through a guided tour?
